TopicTitle: Kerbin City Community Project - Phase B - New Islands

Articles.Content: Correct. It would be a good idea, if for each district we could make one or two lego-style sets of buildings with different forms and colors that easily can be copied and pasted, with maybe a couple of individual buildings such as hospitals, police stations and memorials.
My block re-sized to better fit a kerbal's scale (I'm gonna need a few more buildings):

Well ok sense no one wanted to make my building I made my own! Sadly though it doesn't have any texture and I don't know how to take a screen shot in blender so as soon as I find out the later you will see my building.

Basic features

Roof runway ( that's right)

Rover friendly slops

Helipad

Huge hanger.

Parking lot( to be added)

Cool looking!!

In blender go to the window menu in the top left-ish, also you could alt + print screen

Edited October 20, 2013 by JustinS222

Common textures pack #2 now available!!!

Download:

http://www./download/jxx77ly6io2sdh9/KCity_commontextures_v2.rar

Now it includes:

- 11 CGtextures facades on one texture for generic buildings and all-round everyday use.

- a plain concrete texture

- roof tiles, ceramic, shingle

- dark brick tile (currently used on the "bricky bridge")

- metal roof (will be used on airport roof)

- airport taxiway concrete blocks now included

...and more!

Normal and specular maps for all the textures also exist, but I will not include them in the texture pack. They will be included in the Kerbin City build.

Note: I am starting to convert all textures to .tga cause .png has mipmapping problems since KSP 0.20, that is the reason why some are .png and some .tga. You can work in either of them.

Coming soon:

- Flat roof plates

- Stairs

- Galvanized metal (for street signs)

Here is my progress on the residential area. Since it will be (judging by the map) a separate island, I made it quite large. I would have been finished by now, but there were family matters to attend to this week (I really love birthdays, even when they are not mine) so work went slower than I hoped. Cue the Imgur album:

Please tell me what you guys think. Also, I like your buildings Justin!!!
hey id love to make an underwater submarine base for the Kerbal Coast Guard
Guys, can somebody fix KerbTown and update it to ksp 0.22??
Important Question: Should I make fences between the gardens (in the residential area) or just low walls?

How about for the big apartaments we make buildings like those in Vienna?

http://images.derstandard.at/2009/10/30/1256750099114.jpg
How about for the big apartaments we make buildings like those in Vienna?

I've already made my apartment blocks in a New York Queens style, but those are the 'cheap' ones on the edge of the city. There could be more closer to the center, maybe similar to what you're suggesting...

Guys, can somebody fix KerbTown and update it to ksp 0.22??

I didn't try it in 0.22, "I heard" it works, but only the spawning points don't. Razchek is away so we will have to work in 0.21 until he comes back.
Nothke, can you please tell me what you think about my plot? (Keep in mind it's not 100% finished.) Please?
If you want some help I can try making some props for industrial area (I'm thinking of kethane refinery).

Nothke, if you don't mind, can I use my props (the individual buildings) and make my own little mod out of them? Of course, I'll say that all of it was made for Kerbin City...

You should not make windows like that, close over the wall poly. KSP is a game of huge scales and there will be a lot of z-fighting... Which will be explained in one of my next tutorials
